titleStmt.title: A letter from the army, concerning the peaceable temper of the same. Written by M. J. Saltmarsh attending his Excellency Sir Tho. Fairfax, and sent to a friend in London.
titleStmt.author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the black Spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls Church.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black Spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls Church.
